fields.name: Hello, Caesar
fields.description: Julius Caesar used a shift cipher of -3 to encrypt messages. This message is the first challenge, but Caesar's last words (translated to English).

fields.name: A Prime Challenge
fields.description: This message was encrypted using a shift cipher. The characters were shifted by the product of the first two positive prime numbers, two and three.

fields.name: A Real Sentence
fields.description: The number of words in the message is the same as the amount of shift used to encrypt it.
fields.encrypted: JCNNITW JCNNITW JCNNITW JCNNITW JCNNITW JCNNITW JCNNITW JCNNITW
fields.decrypted: BUFFALO BUFFALO BUFFALO BUFFALO BUFFALO BUFFALO BUFFALO BUFFALO
